Coat rack can be repurposed as a shoe rack by attaching shoe racks to the hooks.
Coat rack can be used as a towel rack by attaching hooks on the wall and hanging towels on them.
Coat rack can be used as a wine rack by attaching wine glasses or wine bottles to the hooks.
Coat rack can be used as a jewelry organizer by attaching hooks on the wall and hanging jewelry on them.
Coat rack can be used as a shelf by attaching small shelves to the hooks.
